args.name: full_name
args.doc: Full name of function in the form of catalog_name.schema_name.function_name.

args.name: def
args.doc: The routine definition of the function.

fields.name: name
fields.doc: Name of function, relative to parent schema.

fields.name: schema_name
fields.doc: Name of parent schema relative to its parent catalog.

items.name: type_text
items.doc: Full data type spec, SQL/catalogString text.

items.name: type_precision
items.doc: Digits of precision; required on Create for DecimalTypes.

items.name: type_scale
items.doc: Digits to right of decimal; Required on Create for DecimalTypes.

items.name: position
items.doc: Ordinal position of column (starting at position 0).

items.name: type_text
items.doc: Full data type spec, SQL/catalogString text.

items.name: type_precision
items.doc: Digits of precision; required on Create for DecimalTypes.

items.name: type_scale
items.doc: Digits to right of decimal; Required on Create for DecimalTypes.

items.name: position
items.doc: Ordinal position of column (starting at position 0).

fields.name: routine_body
fields.doc: Function language. When EXTERNAL is used, specify external_language, and sql_data_access must be NO_SQL.

fields.name: parameter_style
fields.doc: Function parameter style. 'S' is the value for SQL.

fields.name: specific_name
fields.doc: Specific name of the function; Reserved for future use.

fields.name: properties
fields.doc: JSON-serialized key-value pair map, encoded as a string.

fields.name: full_name
fields.doc: Full name of function in the form of catalog_name.schema_name.function_name.

fields.name: owner
fields.doc: Username of the current function owner.

fields.name: created_at
fields.doc: Time at which this function was created, in epoch milliseconds.

fields.name: updated_at
fields.doc: Time at which this function was last updated, in epoch milliseconds.

fields.name: updated_by
fields.doc: Username of the user who last modified the function.

fields.name: function_id
fields.doc: ID of function, relative to parent schema.
